sentences.en: A Greek oil tanker has run aground.
A ship carrying a cargo of oil has run aground.
sentences.cn: 一艘载着油的货轮搁浅了.

sentences.en: Nautical To run ( a vessel ) aground.
Oil is gushing from the tanker which ran aground on the reef.
sentences.cn: 原油正不断地从那条触礁的油船里涌出来.

sentences.en: Our ship ran aground in the fog.
sentences.cn: 我们的船在雾中搁浅了.

sentences.en: Some patients are walking aground the hospital grounds.
sentences.cn: 一些病人在医院内的庭院里散步.

sentences.en: The boat ran aground on a submerged bar in the river.
sentences.cn: 船在河里的水下栅栏上搁浅了.

sentences.en: The ship ran aground on a submerged reef.
The ship ran aground on the rocks.
The ship ran aground where there should have been a depth of 35 ft.
sentences.cn: 这条船在本应该有35英尺深的地方搁浅了。

sentences.en: The ship ran aground where there should have been a depth of 35ft.
sentences.cn: 船搁浅在水深本应为35英尺的地方。

sentences.en: Their boat went aground on a sand bank.
sentences.cn: 他们的船撞上了水下沙洲搁了浅.

sentences.en: We were winning the boat race until our boat went aground ( on an sand bank ).
sentences.cn: 我们快要赢得这次赛艇比赛时,突然我们的船搁浅了.

sentences.en: When it ran aground, they lost heart.
sentences.cn: 当战争遇到挫折时, 他们就失去了信心.

trans.tran_en: if a ship runs aground, it becomes stuck in a place where the water is not deep enough
